suppress.notes: Affecting lots of spring boot libs. We can't update due to a hibernate dependency
Affecting lots of spring boot libs. We can't update due to a hibernate dependency
Will be fixable when we can upgrade to Spring Boot 3.2.1
Dependency brought in through gov-notify, so we can't control this.
The vulnerability only affects applications that use an LDAP CertStore from Bouncy Castle to validate X.509 certificates.
URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in FORM authentication feature Apache Tomcat.
Looks like a new security issue which involves DOS attacks

A vulnerability was found in the Hot Rod client. This security issue occurs as the Hot Rod client does not enable hostname validation when using TLS, possibly resulting in a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack. Will have to wait until azure-sdk-bom is updated to use newer netty library.
